title: Simulation/VR-based Project-Based Learning (PjBL) design workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics education experience and fundamental understanding of Project-Based Learning (PjBL)
context.additional_context: A program for current elementary mathematics practitioners to strengthen PjBL (Project-Based Learning) design competencies in VR/simulation environments.

learning_goals: Learners can design a mathematics project applying the four core principles of PjBL (problem definition, motivation, autonomous task support, and performance evaluation)
Learners can develop at least one field-applicable PjBL scenario using VR simulation tools based on smart devices
Learners can verify the effectiveness of PjBL activities using peer feedback and rubric-based evaluation criteria

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
